pilots.name: Kashyyyk Defender
pilots.text: Equipped with three wide-range Sureggi twin laser cannons, the Auzituck gunship acts as a powerful deterrent to slaver operations in the Kashyyyk system.

pilots.name: Lowhhrick
pilots.caption: Escaped Gladiator
pilots.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 becomes the defender, you may spend 1 reinforce token. If you do, that ship gains 1 evade token.

pilots.name: Wullffwarro
pilots.caption: Wookiee Chief
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are damaged, you may roll 1 additional attack die.
